Free Ground Shipping In Continental United States On Orders Over $199!

Gil Hibben - Original Triple Throwing Knife Set - Small

Includes Free UC0882 - Hibben Knife Throwing Guide*
*Limit One Free Book Per Order

Click to enlarge image(s)
SKU GH0458
Weight 3.0 lb
Everyday Price $34.97
Qty Out of Stock
Weight is based on UPS Dimensional Weight rules.

  • The original Hibben thrower, based on Gil's own karate knife design.
  • This throwing knife also doubles as a functional hunting knife.
  • Each knife is perfectly balanced to assure uniform rotation when thrown properly.
  • This is the most popular and most imitated throwing knife on the market today.
  • Specs:
    • Overall Length: 6-1/8"
    • Blade Length: 3-1/8"
    • Blade Thickness: 2/32"
    • Blade Handle Material: One-piece 420 J2 stainless steel.
    • Sheath: Genuine brown leather
  • Order Online 24 hours A Day 7 Days A Week 365 Days A Year
  • Order by phone 1-517-897-3508
Specifications
Usually Ships: Same or Next Business Day (M-F) When Ordered Before Noon EST
Orders Arrive: 1-4 Business Days After Ship Date
Express Shipping: Is Available
